desc:
Normal attacks may hit all foes, adds all elements to attack & enormously boosts elemental damage
*Activates Guild Raid skill

dictionary.lore: Named after the Vardket deity of poison and medicine, this weapon has been modified and reworked to allow its user to inflict both injury and healing in the same stroke. With additional bio-mechanical material worked into its form and its own muscular electric capacitor discharging secondary currents to maximize its strength and speed, it is considered one of the most effective weapons of death and life on the battlefield. As some have remarked, it is a thing of horrifying beauty, perfectly mirroring its namesake's nature, especially in Guild Raids.

name: Ka-rzn's Excruciation
